description: This file defines a responsive scaffold widget for Flutter applications, adapting navigation UI (bottom navigation bar, navigation rail, or drawer) based on screen size. It includes classes for scaffold destinations and the adaptive scaffold widget that manages the layout and navigation components.

classes.name: AdaptiveScaffoldDestination
classes.description: Represents a navigation item with icon and optional selected icon and label.

classes.name: AdaptiveScaffold
classes.description: A responsive scaffold widget that displays different navigation UI (bottom bar, rail, drawer) based on screen size.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, selecting the appropriate navigation layout based on screen size.
